steps.name: start
steps.guidance: If you like, I can guide you through using Sandtank ML.

steps.name: sandtank
steps.guidance: We will be simulating how water flows through the different soils in this sandtank. Think of an ant farm!

steps.name: simulationPermeability
steps.guidance: The different colors here are different kinds of soil.

steps.name: simulationWater
steps.guidance: This is our output. Our simulation thinks water will be in these places

steps.name: changeSlider
steps.guidance: First, change the water coming into the simulation. These dials set how high the water starts out on each side of the sandtank.

steps.name: wait
steps.guidance: The simulation will run. Continue when it's finished!

steps.name: runAI
steps.guidance: Now, click this to run the ai and notice the differences!

steps.name: compareAIWater
steps.guidance: These boxes are the what our Machine Learning Model thinks our water will look like. Notice any differences!

steps.name: noticeAIDiff
steps.guidance: These boxes are highlight the biggest differences between the our simulation and our machine learning outputs. Are they the same differences you noticed?

steps.name: done
steps.guidance: Play with the values and explore!
